name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Central Time Display（屏幕时间显示-毫秒）

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current time in the top of the screen.显示当前时间到网页上，组件可关闭可拖拽

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the current time on any web page, accurate to milliseconds, components can be dragged and closed, there is a master control switch; Convenient to buy some products.
在任何网页显示当前时间，精确到毫秒，组件可拖拽可关闭，有一个总控制开关；方便一些抢购产品。
